nodes.label: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Forest habitat with trees, colorful birds, squirrel, deer, butterflies, ants, bushes, grasses
Includes different living things typical of a forest
Ocean scene with shades of blue, diverse fish, gray shark, dolphin, seaweed, coral
Includes different living things typical of an ocean
Clear biodiversity differences between forest and ocean
Some plants and animals are unlabeled
Understanding of habitat differences is evident despite unlabeled elements
